platform.title: CLIMB
platform.summary: The CLIMB project (Cloud Infrastructure for Microbial Bioinformatics) develops and deploys a world leading cyber-infrastructure for microbial bioinformatics; providing free cloud-based compute, storage, and analysis tools for academic microbiologists in the UK.
comments: To register for a CLIMB group account, you must:
1. Be a UK academic or public sector worker working on microbial genomics
2. Run your own research group (i.e. be a principal investigator)
4. Agree to our service terms and conditions
The project is supported by three world class Medical Research Fellows, a comprehensive training program and two newly refurbished Bioinformatics facilities in both Warwick and Swansea.
The Galaxy component of CLIMB is based on GVL. CloudBridge, and CloudMan infrastructure.
sponsors: The CLIMB project is a collaboration between Warwick, Birmingham, Cardiff and Swansea Universities.
